headline: Charles Schwab's Crypto Plans Add Fuel To Post-Earnings Rally
summary: Charles Schwab (NYSE:SCHW) shares gained on Monday after the company reported stronger-than-expected second-quarter results on Friday, surpassing analyst consensus estimates for both adjusted earnings per share and revenue. The robust performance has prompted leading Wall Street analysts, including those from JP Morgan and Goldman Sachs, to re-rate the stock and raise their price forecasts, citing strong fundamentals, increased trading activity, and strategic growth initiatives, including the up

headline: Schwab Announces Further Expansion of Overnight Trading
summary: WESTLAKE, Texas, July 21, 2025--Charles Schwab, a leader in investing and trading with $10.76 trillion in total client assets that facilitated 7.6 million daily average trades in Q2 2025, today announced it has significantly expanded the list of securities available for trading overnight. These extended + overnight session orders (EXTO) are continuous orders that expire at 8pm ET each market day. With this expansion, all Schwab retail clients can now trade more than 1,100 securities 24 hours a d

These extended + overnight session orders (EXTO) are continuous orders that expire at 8pm ET each market day.
